blogs.title: Garbage in, garbage out
blogs.summary:
Bill Nye has a new book coming out in November, Unstoppable: Harnessing Science to Change the World. In it, he’s going to write about climate change, among other subjects.
This has Ken Ham annoyed. Don’t you know that if you look at everything

author.name: Pharyngula
author.description: Evolution, development, and random biological ejaculations from a godless liberal

blogs.title: Open thread for night owls: City elects youngest person ever to hold office in Texas
blogs.summary:
